title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: When changing the text in StyledText with word wrap enabled, the editor experiences multiple unnecessary redraws, causing performance issues.
EB: This should result in a maximum of one redraw for each visible line, ensuring efficient performance during text changes with word wrap enabled. Run the test case below to reproduce.
SR:
1. Open the StyledText editor with word wrap enabled.
2. Add or edit text within the editor.
3. Observe the redraw behavior, noting how many times the editor redraws during text changes.
